name: Finger Click'in Good
description:
Your chickens are out of control! You need to help as many of your feathered friends to their other coop but watch out, these mother cluckers have no interest in staying alive!

Controls:

LMB: 

  • Click a Chicken to flip its walking Direction
  • Click the Chicken Icon to begin spawning Chickens
  • Click the Fast Forward Button to speed up or slow down the game speed
  • Click the redo Button to restart the level
